item.dimdungeons.item_trophy_1_line2: %1$sA rare mushroom. It will not grow on mycelium.%2$s
item.dimdungeons.item_trophy_2_line2: %1$sThis blessed sword sleeps, waiting for a specific hero.%2$s
item.dimdungeons.item_trophy_3_line2: %1$sA coveted symbol of greed. But aren't diamonds worth more than stone?%2$s
item.dimdungeons.item_trophy_4_line2: %1$sA most legendary yoyo from another world's moon.%2$s
item.dimdungeons.item_trophy_5_line2: %1$sA powerful mining tool from a far away galaxy.%2$s
item.dimdungeons.item_trophy_6_line2: %1$sGive this to a friend in the name of jolly cooperation!%2$s
item.dimdungeons.item_trophy_7_line2: %1$sWhat purpose does this magenta terracotta pressure plate serve?%2$s
item.dimdungeons.item_trophy_8_line2: %1$sAn image of a mischievous octopus from another world.%2$s
book.dimdungeons.author: Catastrophe573
book.dimdungeons.fun_message_1: Consider bringing a few ender pearls with you. They can save you in trap rooms.
book.dimdungeons.fun_message_2: Many chests contain more dungeon keys in their loot table. So you can keep dungeoneering!
book.dimdungeons.fun_message_3: If you find another portal then you are very lucky! Be sure to take the rare key that is inside the keyhole.
book.dimdungeons.fun_message_4: These dungeons are an excellent source of enchanted books.
book.dimdungeons.fun_message_5: Rare enemy spawner rooms are known to exist. These rooms are as valuable as any treasure!
book.dimdungeons.fun_message_6: Some rooms have treasure chests that only appear if you are lucky. These chests can draw from any loot table!
book.dimdungeons.fun_message_7: I care about your feedback and ideas! You can send me comments however you like.
book.dimdungeons.fun_message_8: Some rooms are safe places to hide, heal, or take free treasure. No catch.
book.dimdungeons.helpful_message_1: Some rooms have carefully hidden treasure chests. Be sure to closely inspect anything suspicious!
book.dimdungeons.helpful_message_2: If you've think you've seen a room before, think again. Many subtle variations exist!
book.dimdungeons.helpful_message_3: Using a blank map inside a dungeon might prove surprisingly useful!
book.dimdungeons.helpful_message_4: Did you know that cauldrons interact with redstone comparators through walls?
book.dimdungeons.helpful_message_5: A cubic zirconia is as good as a real diamond. But it is a fake prize.
book.dimdungeons.helpful_message_6: Some puzzles may require a potion of swiftness or two players to solve.
book.dimdungeons.helpful_message_7: Advanced portal frames require two special banners and two crown pieces. The crown pieces can be found as loot.
book.dimdungeons.helpful_message_8: In the obsidian hallway try throwing some end stone onto the end stone, if nothing else seems to work.
book.dimdungeons.dangerous_message_1: I have tried very hard not to ever trap you inside a room. But if it does happen don't forget the /kill command.
book.dimdungeons.dangerous_message_2: The room with 4 trapped chests is unfair. Be careful not to lose all of your items!
book.dimdungeons.dangerous_message_3: In the room with the piston bridge over lava it may be required to jump over the sides!
book.dimdungeons.dangerous_message_4: In this dimension fire cannot be extinguished by punching it. Fire pits are very dangerous!
book.dimdungeons.dangerous_message_5: If you somehow get outside of the dungeon's walls, you'll fall into a void.
book.dimdungeons.dangerous_message_6: The falling anvil trap never gets old. CLANG!
book.dimdungeons.dangerous_message_7: Minecraft has dozens of inspirational death messages.
book.dimdungeons.dangerous_message_8: Version 1.16 enables so many new beautiful and dangerous build possibilities!
book.dimdungeons.advanced_message_1: Enemies in advanced dungeons have extra health and are immune to fire. I couldn't make it too easy!
book.dimdungeons.advanced_message_2: Enemies in advanced dungeons move faster and have jump boost. You've probably noticed by now!
book.dimdungeons.advanced_message_3: Advanced dungeons are twice as large as other dungeons! It's double the treasure and double the peril!
book.dimdungeons.advanced_message_4: The treasure chests in advanced dungeons contain extra loot!
book.dimdungeons.advanced_message_5: I decided against adding the Ravager as a random encounter in advanced dungeons. You're welcome.
book.dimdungeons.advanced_message_6: Have you been ambushed by a Blaze yet?
book.dimdungeons.advanced_message_7: You can safely rename dungeon keys and they will still teleport you to the same place.
book.dimdungeons.advanced_message_8: There is more to come! This isn't the final dungeon.
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_1: This short guide will spell out everything you need to know about building a portal, crafting keys, and raiding dungeons!
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_2: First, your portal will require 3 Gilded Portal Blocks. To craft a Gilded Portal Block surround a Chiseled Stone Brick with 8 Gold Ingots.
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_3: Second, your portal requires a Keyhole Block. To craft this item take one of your 3 Gilded Portal Blocks and combine it with a Trapped Chest and an Eye of Ender.
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_4: Your portal build starts with a frame built out of Stone Bricks, 4 blocks tall and 3 wide. (With two air blocks in the middle.) Replace the top center block with your Portal Keystone.
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_5: Finish your portal by placing spires 1 block away on both sides of the frame. Spires are three blocks tall and have a Gilded Portal Block on top.
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_6: Portal Keys can be crafted from a Name Tag and a Blaze Rod. But Portal Keys need to be activated before they can be used.
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_7: To activate a Portal Key, find a stronghold, and use the key on the top side of an End Portal Frame block. The key should now have a unique name!
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_8: Once a key is activated it will always take you to the same dungeon. You will need to craft and activate more keys to visit new dungeons. Keys may be inserted and removed from keyholes any number of times.
book.dimdungeons.guidebook_9: More advice will be dispensed inside the dungeons themselves.                                     (The author's penmanship looks very rushed...)
book.dimdungeons.open_guide_message: Catastrophe573 suddenly appears for just a moment, hastily writes into the book, and hands it back to you.
book.dimdungeons.thank_you_message: Thank you for playing Dimensional Dungeons! I'm sorry I didn't finish the guidebook but I'm working very hard!
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_1: This portal key is not activated. Blank keys must be activated before being used.
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_2: The two blocks below the portal keyhole must be open.
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_3: A block is missing in the portal frame.
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_4: Portal frames should be built out of Stone Brick, not
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_5: A block is missing in one of the portal spires. Are they the correct distance and height?
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_6: Portal spires should be built out of Stone Brick, not
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_7: Portal spires need to have a Gilded Portal Block on top, not
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_8: Two Portal Crown Blocks must be placed on top of the portal before advanced keys can be used.
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_9: White or purple banners must be hung on the spires before advanced keys can be used.
error.dimdungeons.portal_error_10: The banner pattern on either or both banners is not correct for advanced keys.
advancements.dimdungeons.dungeons.activa: Find an end portal frame and use it to activate a blank key.
advancements.dimdungeons.dungeons.enter_: Welcome to your first Dimensional Dungeon.
advancements.dimdungeons.dungeons.find_c: Find two portal crown blocks in the dungeon.
advancements.dimdungeons.dungeons.find_a: Find an advanced portal key in a dungeon.
advancements.dimdungeons.dungeons.enter_: Twice the peril, twice the loot!
